name: Brown Cub Skin
description: "A slightly chubby cub that got into the Royal Jelly."
where_from: Rewarded after completing 300 Brown Bear Quests

name: Robo Cub Skin
description: "They forgot a few drives when constructing this Robo Bear."
where_from:
Reward from finishing in the top 10 of the Daily Robo Bear Challenge Leaderboard
Reward for winning round 25 of Robo Bear's Challenge for the first time...
Or: Rewarded after collecting  250,000 Cogs

name: Stick Cub Skin
description: "This stick nymph evolved to camouflage itself as a bear."
where_from:
Reward from finishing in the top 25 of the Daily Stick Bug Challenge Leaderboard
Dropped by Stick Bug (Unbelievably Rare)
Stick Bug Challenge Reward (Unbelievably Rare)

name: Star Cub Skin
description: "A cosmic cub visiting from another galaxy."
where_from:
Awarded after sticking all 12 Star Signs to the Sticker Stack
Using the Diamond Star Amulet Generator (1 in a million chance)
Sticker Printer (Star Egg, All Gifted Eggs)

name: Noob Cub Skin
description: "This little noob doesn't know the first thing about running a shop."
where_from: This was included in the Cub Buddy Launch Pack

name: Bee Cub Skin
description: "A young polar bear going through an identity crisis."
where_from: This was the final reward of Bee Bear's 2019 quests

name: Gingerbread Cub Skin
description: "A cub made of cookies, brought to life by Honeyday Magic!"
where_from: Purchased in Bee Bear's 2020 Catalog for  250 Gingerbread Bears

name: Snow Cub Skin
description: "This cruel cub was carved from a Lvl 20 Snowbear's snowball."
where_from: This was the final reward in Bee Bear's March 2022 quests

name: Peppermint Robo Cub Skin
description: "A clockwork cub composed of cogs and candycanes."
where_from: This was the final reward in Bee Bear's April 2023 quests

name: Doodle Cub Skin
description: "Cut from cardboard and scribbled up with magic crayons."
where_from: Completing all of Bee Bear's Summer 2024 quests (not yet available)
